title: Bound by Lies
description: After trudging in the footsteps of the Fomorian army, Aileen longs to have a home of her own far from the horrors of war. She will do anything to achieve her goal. Even lie to the kin and people of her newly deceased husband.But lies are nothing, compared with drugging a pixie king and stealing his memory ... and his seed.
author: S.E. Gilchrist
